title: Waistcoat, 1770–80
medium: Technique: Embroidery: chain stitch made with a tambour hook using 16 colors of silk on a silk plain weave foundation.
description: Gentleman's collarless embroidered waistcoat with embroidery at center front and in area below pockets. Twelve buttons.

tombstone.epitaph: Waistcoat, 1770–80.Technique: Embroidery: chain stitch made with a tambour hook using 16 colors of silk on a silk plain weave foundation.. 1941-102-22.
